Package org.jfree.data.statistics

Interface StatisticalCategoryDataset

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CategoryDataset, Dataset, KeyedValues2D, Values2D
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BioStatisticalCategoryDataset, DefaultStatisticalCategoryDataset

    public interface StatisticalCategoryDataset
extends CategoryDataset
    A category dataset that defines a median and standard deviation value for each item.
    Author:
    Pascal Collet
